metadata.title: Code des loix des Gentoux
metadata.creator: Stoupe,M.(Jean-Georges-Antoine),-188
Stoupe, M. (Jean-Georges-Antoine), -1808
Robinet, J. B. (Jean Baptiste), 1735-1820
Démeunier, M. (Jean Nicolas), 1741-1814
Halhed, Nathaniel Brassey, 1751-1830
metadata.publisher: A Paris : Chez Stoupe, imprimeur-libraire, rue de la Harpe
metadata.description: Prospectus for French translation by J.B. Robinet of Nathaniel Brassey Halhed's "A code of Gentoo laws, or, Ordinations of the pundits," an English translation made from the Vivādārnavasētu, a digest of Hindu law compiled for Warren Hastings by several pandits. French translation also attributed to Jean Nicolas Démeunier. Cf. BN, CLIII, column 562
Listings for other titles sold by Stoupe on p. [2]
metadata.notes: No copyright found. No table of contents found. Damaged, stained pages. No page numbers.
